value.title: Join the Final Lap of the 2020 DeepRacer League at AWS re:Invent 2020
value.excerpt: AWS DeepRacer is the fastest way to get rolling with machine learning (ML). It’s a fully autonomous 1/18th scale race car driven by reinforcement learning, a 3D racing simulator, and a global racing league. value.title: Treviranus, Butler and Fruchterman to speak at Sight Tech Global
value.excerpt: Sight Tech Global goes live the week after Thanksgiving on December 2-3, and now’s the time to pick up a free pass! The agenda for this virtual, global event on AI-related technology and accessibility for people who are blind or visually impaired just keeps getting better.

value.title: Walmart and Cruise launch pilot to deliver orders via self-driving cars
value.excerpt: As part of the pilot, which is scheduled to begin in early 2021, customers will be able to place orders from a Walmart and have them delivered via one of Cruise’s electric self-driving Chevy Bolts.

value.title: Neural’s market outlook for artificial intelligence in 2021 and beyond

value.title: Elon Musk Raises Price of Tesla's Full Self-Driving Package to $10,000 USD
value.excerpt: Following through with what Elon Musk has said before, the CEO of Tesla has now announced a price hike for the EV automaker’s Full Self-Driving (FSD) package, bringing it up by $2,000 USD to $10,000 USD.

value.title: Waymo shares in-depth details of self-driving car activity in Phoenix

value.title: Tesla Hikes Up the Price of 'Full Self-Driving' Option to $10,000
value.excerpt: Tesla bumped up the price of its "full self-driving" from $8,000 to $10,000 on Friday, and odds are this won’t be the last price hike Tesla owners see.
